snippet: Troubled platinum miner Lonmin said on Monday its chief operating officer (COO) has resigned for personal reasons....

headline.main: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments
headline.print_headline: Germany's Turkish Community Say Erdogan Went Too Far With Nazi Comments

lead_paragraph: Troubled platinum miner Lonmin said on Monday its chief operating officer (COO) has resigned for personal reasons.
